org.webcurator.domain
Interface BaseDAO

All Known Subinterfaces:
ProfileDAO, TargetDAO
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseDAOImpl, ProfileDAOImpl, TargetDAOImpl
public interface BaseDAO

Base DAO interface. Over time common methods should be moved into this dao so they can be reused in all dao implementations.

Author:
bbeaumont
